mapper.select: select art_type from Article group by art_type order by count(art_type) desc

select art_id, art_title, art_spider, art_type, art_tags, art_image_url, art_time, art_legal, art_cus_id, from Article left join artscorelist on Article.art_id = artscorelist.asl_art_id order by art_time desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
